鮬鮬鮬

鮬字的基本解释

鮬
kū
鳑鲏。

鮬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kū］
［《廣韻》苦胡切，平模，溪。］
［《廣韻》薄故切，去暮，並。］
鱼名。又名鳜鯞、妾鱼，即鳑鲏。
[②]［kù］
［《集韻》苦故切，去莫，溪。］
见“魚鮬”。

鮬字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鮬； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1470第03
【廣韻】薄故切【集韻】蒲故切，?音步。【爾雅·釋魚】鱊鮬，鱖鯞。【註】小魚也。似鮒子而黑，俗呼爲魚婢，江東呼爲妾魚。又【廣韻】苦胡切【集韻】空胡切，?音枯。又【集韻】【韻會】?虧于切，音區。又【集韻】貧悲切，音邳。又匈于切，音訏。又楛瓜切，音誇。義?同。又【集韻】苦故切，音庫。藏魚子也。

鮬字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鮬字的起名意思

暂无。

Scorpion
Basic explanation of words
Scorpion
kū
Tortoise.
Scorpion
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kū］
["Guangyun" bitter beard cut, flat mold, creek. ]
["Guangyun" thin so cut, go to dusk, and. ]
The name of the fish. Also known as mandarin fish, concubine fish, namely tortoise fish.
[②]［kù］
["Ji Yun" bitterly cut, go to Mo, Xi. ]
See "fish 鮬".
Scorpion
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鮬; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1470 No. 03
[Guang Yun] thin and cut [Ji Yun] Pu Gu cut, sound step. [Erya·Shiyu] 鱊鮬, 鱊鯞. [Note] Xiaoyu also. It looks like a crucian carp but black, and is commonly called a fish maid, and Jiangdong calls a concubine fish. Also [Guang Yun] bitter Hu cut [Ji Yun] empty Hu cut, the sound is dry. Also 【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】? Lost in the cut, the sound area. Also 【Jiyun】Poverty and sorrowful, with sound. Huon Yuqi again, Yinxu. Cut the melon again, boasting. Righteous? Same. Also [Jiyun] the bitter story, the sound library. Hidden roe also.
Scorpion

яп. японский морской судак (Lateolabrax japonicus)
